name: Azure Data Explorer MCP Server
description: Sets up the environment for the Azure Data Explorer Model Context Protocol server

version.description: Version of the ADX MCP server to install (defaults to latest)

adxClusterUrl.description: Azure Data Explorer cluster URL (empty by default, must be specified at runtime)

adxDatabase.description: Azure Data Explorer database name (empty by default, must be specified at runtime)

installDependencies.description: Install Python dependencies required for the ADX MCP server

installUv.description: Install uv package manager for Python

serverPort.description: Port to run the MCP server on (defaults to 3000)
